sentences.en: Chief Physician , Associate Professor Vice Director of Neurology Dept.

sentences.en: Freud's work stands at the crossroads between psychology and neurology.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德的理论站在心理学和精神病学的交叉点上.

sentences.en: Freud's work stands at the crossroads between psychology and nEurology.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德的著作属于心理学和神经学的交叉领域.

sentences.en: He trained in neurology at the National Hospital for Nervous Diseases.
sentences.cn: 他在国立神经内科医院接受神经病学的训练。

sentences.en: He visited the Institute of Neurology in Havana where they both worked.
sentences.cn: 他访问了两人都曾工作过的哈瓦那的神经病学研究所.

sentences.en: Neurology: Medical specialty concerned with nervous system function and disorders.
sentences.cn: 神经学: 研究有关神经系统功能或障碍的医学专科.

sentences.en: Neuropsychological Neurology: The Neurocognitive Impairments of Neurological Disorders.
sentences.cn: 天才的诞生: 达尔文的进化论角度.

sentences.cn: 单位: 首都医科大学附属北京天坛医院神经内科.

sentences.en: The findings appeared in the journal Neurology.
sentences.cn: 研究结果刊登到了《神经学》杂志上.

sentences.en: The findings are published in the May issue of Archies of Neurology.
sentences.cn: 研究结果发表在《神经病学档案》五月刊上.

sentences.en: The foreseeable nursing applied to severe case in department of neurology was more effective.
sentences.cn: 结论:预见性护理应用于神经内科重症患者在预防并发症方面优于常规护理.

sentences.en: To discuss the possibility of foreseeable nursing applied to severe case in department of neurology.
sentences.cn: 探讨预见性护理应用于神经内科重症患者的可行性.
